price: Dhugumatti, Nuti kitaaba yaadannoon (gorsi) keessan isa keessa jiru gara keessanitti buufnee jirra, Sila hin xiinxaltanuu?
arabic: لَقَدۡ أَنزَلۡنَآ إِلَيۡكُمۡ كِتَٰبٗا فِيهِ ذِكۡرُكُمۡۚ أَفَلَا تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: laqad anzalnā ilaykum kitāban fīhi dhik'rukum afalā taʿqilūna
